title: Video-chat about social media manipulation
dc:creator: admin
description: I recorded a podcast interview for @USCAnnenberg on my research career so far, starting from games and w/ highlights about ten years of research on social media manipulation, and the upcoming #Election2020 #ElectionTwitter
